Reference

Classify data

Functions used for classifying data

categorize() categorise()

Categorize cases based on external data and classification scheme

classify()

Classify elements

codify()

codify elements

index()

Calculate index based on classification scheme

Classification schemes

Default classification schemes for comorbidity and adverse events

charlson_icd10

Classcodes for Charlson based on ICD-10 codes

cps_icd10

Classcodes for the comorbidity-polypharmacy score (CPS) based on ICD-10 codes

elix_icd10

Classcodes for Elixhauser based on ICD-10 codes

hip_adverse_events_icd10_old

Old classcodes for adverse events after hip arthroplasty based on ICD-10 codes

hip_fracture_ae_icd10

Classcodes for adverse events after THA after hip fracture based on ICD-10 codes

hip_fracture_ae_kva

Classcodes for adverse events after THA after hip fracture based on Atgardskoder (KVA codes)

knee_adverse_events_icd10

Classcodes for adverse events after knee and hip arthroplasty based on ICD-10 codes

rxriskv_atc rxriskv_modified_atc

Classcodes for RxRiskV (original and modified)

Codedata

Functions to handle data set with code data

as.codedata() is.codedata()

Code data

Example data

ex_carbrands

Example classcodes object for classification of car brands by their producer

ex_cars

Example data for can registry

ex_icd10

Example data for random codes assigned to random people

ex_people

Example data for random people

Help functions for classcode data

Functions used for classifying data

all_classcodes()

Summary data for all default classcodes object in the package

as.data.frame(<classified>) as.data.table(<classified>)

Convert output from classify to data frame or data.table

as.classcodes() is.classcodes()

Classcodes methods

print(<summary.classcodes>)

Print summary for classcodes object

summary(<classcodes>)

Summarizing a classcodes object

visualize() visualise()

Visualise classification scheme in web browser

Additional help functions

dates_within()

Check if dates are within limits

filter_dates()

Filter dates outside specified limits

spss2date()

Convert SPSS date to valid date
